headline: VEECO ATOMIC FORCE MICROSCOPE
description: Atomic Force Microscope--AFM       System sold AS IS
categories.lvl2: Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment  >  Metrology Equipment > Other Metrology Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Veeco
Model Dektak SXM
Description Atomic Force Microscope
Accessories Tip Assemblies Included
  • P/N:AFM8175-Qty 1
  • P/N:AFM8153-Qty 3
Other Information Specifications
  • Sample size: 200mm
  • Sample thickness: 10mm Max.
  • Max sample weight: 220 grams
  • Scan field: 70 x 70 micron
  • Vertical range: ±7 micron
  • Linearity: ±0.2%
  • Orthogonality: 90 degrees ±3%
  • Three-Axis Motion: Colosed-loop feedback control
  • Vertical stability:, 1nm
  • Sample viewing: 6:1 zoom range with 592 micron x 445 micron normal view image at max zoom.
  • OS/2 Operating system
Power Requirements 120/240 V 10.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Year of Manufacture 1996
Exterior Dimensions
Width 60.000 in (152.4 cm)
Depth 43.000 in (109.2 cm)
Height 68.000 in (172.7 cm)
Weight 1,400 lb (635 kg)
